#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<sstream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s,sss,ssss;
    char ch=' ';
    string :: reverse_iterator it;
    getline(cin,s,'.');
    s+=' ';
    stringstream ss;
    ss<<s;
    while(getline(ss,sss,ch))
    {
                           //ss>>sss;
                           for(it=sss.rbegin();it<sss.rend();it++)
                           {
                                                                  ssss+=*it;
                           }
                           ss.clear();
                           ssss+=ch;
    }
    int k=ssss.size();
    ssss[k-1]='.';
    cout<<"\n"<<ssss;
}
